oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Temperature dependent positron annihilation studies in Nafion-117 polymer
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SODAYE, HS
PUJARI, PK
GOSWAMI, A
MANOHAR, SB
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: spectroscopy
membranes
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We have measured the S-parameter and life-time as a function of temperature from 15 to 300 K in acid Nafion-117. In addition, high temperature measurements from 300 to 550 K have been carried out in acid as well as Cs neutralised Nafion membrane. The results are discussed. (C) 2000 Elsevier Science Ltd. All rights reserved.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: 6th International Workshop on Positron and Positronium Chemistry (PPC-6),TSUKUBA, JAPAN,JUN 07-11, 1999
